Interface IEmailTemplateSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IEmailTemplateSource
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Interface description...
    Author:
    bjohnson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale, java.lang.String strTemplateFilename)
      Returns the email template for the template filename.

    • Method Detail

      • getEmailTemplates

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(java.lang.String strTopic,
                                           java.lang.String[] keywords)
        Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        strTopic - The email topic. If null, returns templates w/o regard to topic.
        keywords - An array of keywords for selective searching.
        Returns:
        An array of email templates matching the specified criteria.

      • getEmailTemplates

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(ILocale locale,
                                           java.util.Map valuesToMatch)
        Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to generate the email for
        valuesToMatch - An map of name values to match
        Returns:
        An array of email templates matching the specified criteria.

      • getEmailTemplate

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(java.lang.String strTemplateFilename)
        Returns the email template for the template filename.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
        Returns:
        A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.

      • getEmailTemplate

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale,
                                        java.lang.String strTemplateFilename)
        Returns the email template for the template filename.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
        locale - the locale to generate the email for
        Returns:
        A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.
